verbs.description: In [ARGM-LOC: media appearances] to [V: promote] [ARG1: his new book] , former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper is telling people that the FBI 's use of a secret informant to make contact with Trump campaign workers is " quite legitimate " ; he 's sure that " no one " in the Obama White House knew about it ; and neither did he , at the time , he says .
